description: Digital output instrument profile with bad quality detection. Used for discrete command outputs (e.g., on/off valves, solenoids, pump start/stop) where only a boolean write is required. Includes Mode parameter and Bypass capability.
applicableTo: Instruments with digital command output only (DO)

attributes.name: ShortName
attributes.description: Human-readable equipment name used in UNS topic path

attributes.name: ProfileDefinition
attributes.description: URL to the SM Profile definition that this instance conforms to

attributes.name: Description
attributes.description: Free-text description of the equipment instance

IO.description: Process I/O - single digital output command bound to field instrument via MQTT

attributes.name: DO_Command
attributes.description: Digital command setpoint sent to field instrument (true = on/open)

Parameters.description: Configurable parameters for alarm enables, operating modes, and bypass

attributes.name: DO_Bad_Alarm_Enab
attributes.description: Enable/disable bad quality alarm on digital output

attributes.name: Bypass
attributes.description: Output is bypassed (ignored by control logic)

attributes.name: Operator
attributes.description: Operator acknowledgment or manual override flag

attributes.name: ResetReq
attributes.description: Reset request flag (clear alarm or fault condition)

Alarms.description: Alarm conditions: bad quality on DO; ESTOP

attributes.name: DO_Bad_Quality
attributes.description: Digital output has bad data quality (communication loss)
